title: Projects - Saurabh Saurabh
text:
Company: Artisan Smoke Shop
- Role: Sales Associate
- Results: Implemented upselling and cross-selling strategies, increasing average transaction value by 15% over 6 months.



Company: Kal Tire
- Role: Tire Technician/Shipper-Receiver
- Results: Streamlined tire preparation and tracking processes, reducing order fulfillment time by 20%.



Project: Developed an efficiency plan for a retail chain
- Objective: Optimize inventory and customer service operations.
- Outcome: Proposed a CRM-based solution, projecting a 10% improvement in customer satisfaction.



Here are some of my previous projects, showcasing strategic planning and financial forecasting skills in the beauty and wellness industry:


My project is about creating a digital marketing campaign for Radical Root Seed Bombs to increase online visibility, customer engagement, and sales through strategies like SEO, content creation, social media marketing, and e-commerce—focusing on eco-conscious consumers and sustainable gardening trends.
Download Project File



This project outlines financial projections for My Beauty Secrets VIP Medical Spa from 2025 to 2027, including a budget for the AI system, training, and marketing, aiming to increase revenue and customer acquisition.
Download Project File

title: MBA Portfolio
text:
Hello! I’m Saurabh Saurabh, an MBA candidate with a background in Civil Engineering and strong skills in customer service and organizational management. Explore my portfolio to learn about my education, professional experience, and skills.



Saurabh Saurabh


Use the navigation bar above to dive into specific sections. Let’s connect to discuss how I can contribute to your business goals!
Contact Me


Hello! I’m Saurabh Saurabh, an MBA candidate specializing in Business Administration with a focus on Executive Assistance. I hold a Bachelor’s degree in Civil Engineering from KIET Group of Institutions, Ghaziabad, and bring a diverse skill set in customer service, time management, and problem-solving. My professional journey spans roles in sales, inventory management, and technical support, where I’ve honed my ability to work independently and as part of a team. I’m passionate about continuous improvement and excellence, aiming to contribute effectively in dynamic business environments.
Last updated: May 18, 2025

text:
Master of Business Administration (MBA), Business Administration (Executive Assistance)
Vancouver, Expected May 2025

Relevant Coursework: Organizational Management, Financial Analysis, Strategic Planning

Bachelor of Civil Engineering
KIET Group of Institutions, Ghaziabad, 2017–2021

Graduated with Honors

Relevant Coursework: Structural Analysis, Project Management, Engineering Design







Artisan Smoke Shop, Surrey/Vancouver, 07/2024–03/2025
- Handled cash transactions and operated POS systems, ensuring accuracy and efficiency.
- Managed inventory and stock replenishment, maintaining optimal stock levels.
- Assisted customers with product knowledge, following strict age-verification protocols (19+).
- Enhanced sales through effective upselling and cross-selling techniques.
- Maintained a clean and organized store environment, improving customer experience.



Kal Tire, Coquitlam, 03/2024–05/2024
- Organized and prepared tires for daily schedules, ensuring timely service delivery.
- Managed receipt and shipment of tires, maintaining accurate tracking and documentation.
- Repaired tire damages using specialized techniques, ensuring safety and quality.
- Mounted and balanced tires for personal and commercial vehicles.
- Kept the shop clean and organized, upholding high standards of presentation.



Naukri.com, Noida, 09/2022–03/2023
- Advised job seekers on products and services, helping them achieve career goals.
- Made outbound sales calls to job seekers and employers, driving service adoption.
- Utilized CRM tools to track leads, manage customer data, and ensure follow-ups.
- Provided post-sales support, addressing customer issues and ensuring satisfaction.
